description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Come for the missiles, stay for the lasers.  Help Bad Bunny defend his humble hole from an onslaught of fascist good bunnies.  Spoiler alert, you will eventually fail but its the effort that counts.
description.short: Come for the missiles, stay for the lasers.  Help Bad Bunny defend his humble hole from an onslaught of fascist good bunnies.  Spoiler alert, you will eventually fail but its the effort that counts.
